_comment: Config for project analytics. Pages are now auto-discovered via evar66 (event_name).

projects.label: Next Gen Gamecast Football
projects.description: Redesign of NFL Gamecast (ongoing) + My Bets feature (Aug 25 - Dec 1). My Bets showed linked bet users their placed bets on the Gamecast page.
projects._notes: Redesign is still live. Only My Bets feature was disabled on Dec 1.
